title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama servers; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational TUI for Ollama with history, markdown rendering, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation template using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles, quantized GGUFs, and example prompts for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats, generates images, and moderates using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with LINQ-friendly chat builders and Blazor sample app.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models from BPMN service tasks for human-like decisions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing Ollama’s REST API with tokio and serde; includes Axum example.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper that pools Ollama connections via GenServer for scalable Phoenix chat apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models for smart note completion and summarization.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads replies using Ollama models and caches responses in Redis.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to spin up GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama server pre-installed.
